name: Betty Mannequin
description:
This simple striped linen ticking works beautifully.  I love the corset and laced back feature especially with the deep red organza ribbon but you could choose a simpler flat back version. 

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Antique Inspired Ribbon Flower Corsage #113
description:
Beautiful antique inspired flower corsage handmade exquisitely with the prettiest shaded ribbons measuring app 5" x 4"

This corsage will come with a meter of satin ribbon for you to fasten around the waist of your mannequin or the corsage can be pinned directly into the mannequin.

Of course, I've shown the corsages on my mannequins but they have so some many more uses...its up to you and your imagination.

Each corsage will come boxed and tissue wrapped. 
UK P&P Â£4.00

name: Limited Edition Rosie Mannequin
description:
The one and only Rosie!  Isn't she pretty.  She's been tailored using a wonderful textured vintage fabric.  The background is white and the bouquet of stunning flowers in vibrant reds, pinks and greens.  

She is a size 8/10 with a flat back and shown here on a black stand.  

Dispatch will be made within 3 business days.

name: Velvet Cover - Red
description:
Perfect for sprucing up your old mannequin. Simply slip on this fabulous velvet cover and hey presto she's as good as new! These are the same covers I use on my mannequins but without the body and stand.

This premium stretchy cover will fit a standard mannequin size UK 10/12 with measurements approximately 36" bust, 24" waist & 36" hips.

These covers are made to order so please expect to wait up to 5-7 days for dispatch.

name: Celia in Fennel
description:
A stunning Celia mannequin in Fennil.  Shown here on a 10/12 mannequin with a corset & laced back on a black stand and top.  This gorgeous fabric comes in many different colourways, so please do ask if you love the fabric but would prefer a different colour.  The Peacock colourway is shown here too.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Violet Mannequin
description:
IN STOCK Violet is a size 10/12 with flat back.

Love it or hate it, Downton Abbey has been a roaring success.  This wonderful fabric has been created with my favourite character, Violet, Dowager Countess of Grantham, in mind. Its a wonderfully sophisticated damask with charcoals, blacks and creams and also available in a gorgeous shade of heather.

Shown here in a size 10/12 with flat back and black stand & top.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The fabric colourway - charcoal or heather
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Sophia Mannequin in Pink
description:
IN STOCK Sophia is a 10/12 with flat back.

Stunning full sized mannequin tailored in Kate Forman's Sophia Pink linen fabric. Its actually a lovely oatmeal base with a beautiful faded pattern, full of English country house charm.  The other mannequin shown here is Sophia in Grey.

Shown here on a 10/12 mannequin on a cream stand.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Vintage Fabric Monogramme Wasp Waisted Mannequin
description:
I've teamed up with Jennifer at Starched & Crumpled to bring you a new mannequin tailored in a beautiful vintage monogrammed cloth.  This gorgeous fabric has the initials Cs & J embroidered on the chest with a pretty red & blue stripe running down the middle on the front and back of the mannequin. The other mannequin shown here is sold.

This mannequin is unique and there will never be another one made in this cloth.

Displayed here on a black stand but you could choose a plain beech, white or cream painted stand.

name: Estelle Mannequin
description:
Colourful toile de jouy linen with dark lilac/grey background. Tailored here with a flat back finish and in a size 8/10 mannequin.

Dispatch will be made within 3 business days.

name: Vintage 1967 French Grain Sack Mannequin OOAK #6
description:
A stunning, one of a kind mannequin tailored using a antique French grain sack dating from 1967. I love the colours and textures of old grain sacks and this one has heaps of detail and charm. There are a number of original darns/mends to the fabric which add to the overall vintage industrial feel and the stenciling is simply awesome!  

The sack has been washed and tailored to fit a NEW, size 8/10, mannequin. The back finish is a flat back, hand stitched seam and shown here on a black painted stand & top.

I will be making more of these fabulous mannequins using other sacks/bags but each one will be a unique one of a kind beauty.

name: Sophia Mannequin in Grey
description:
Stunning full sized mannequin tailored in Kate Forman's Sophia Grey linen fabric. Its actually a lovely oatmeal base with a beautiful faded pattern, full of English country house charm.
Also available in a pale chalky pink.

Shown here on a 10/12 mannequin on a black stand.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed

name: Emma Mannequin
description:
This simple, elegant mannequin is probably my most popular. I must have literally made hundreds! She works beautifully as a display in her own right or, of course, to display garments, scarves and jewels.

Tailored using Laura Ashley's 100% linen called Austen in Natural and here with a corset and laced back but you could choose to have a hand stitched side seam ie flat backed.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

description:
Another mannequin with a the look and feel of a vintage/antique mannequin...Eve

The fabric is a linen which I have aged and stained so each mannequin will be unique.  There is also a seam running down the front of the mannequin creating more vintage appeal.  

Shown here in a size 8/10 mannequin with a flat back finish.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

description:
Stunning full sized mannequin tailored in Peony & Sage fabric by Kimberley Bell. A beautiful linen with clusters of faded pale pink roses. Do take a peek at the new Peony & Sage website as they have some stunning fabrics which I hope to be using more of very soon.

Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin with a flat backed finish.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

name: Gift Vouchers
description:
Treat someone you love to a gift voucher! 
Available for Â£25, Â£50, Â£125 and Â£200

Redeemable against any item in the Corset Laced Mannequin online shop. 
You will be sent a special voucher code within 24 hours of purchase! Recipients can then add their code at checkout to have the voucher amount discounted from their order.

Simple! Presents sorted!

name: Velvet Pink Mannequin
description:
I'm honoured to be able to say that this beautiful pink velvet mannequin, along with the other mannequins shown here, was featured in the new UK hit TV show Gok's Clothes Roadshow and soon to be seen on Sky TV "Britain & Ireland's Next Top Model"!

I call these my seamless mannequins because they only have one seam running down each side.  The cover is fixed to the mannequin.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

These mannequins are made to order (unless you've found her in the "in stock" category...in which case she's available for immediate dispatch!) so please expect to wait up to 7 business days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Antique Inspired Matilda Mannequin
description: I've been asked on many occasions to make a mannequin which has the look and feel of a vintage/antique mannequin and here she is...Matilda. The fabric is a linen which I have aged and stained so each mannequin will be unique. There is also a seam running down the front of the mannequin creating more vintage appeal. The stencil is made using a waterproof ink...I love the stencil but if you would prefer her without then take a peek at Eve here EVE MANNEQUIN Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin with a corset laced back. YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. -The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed -The size - 10/12 or 8/10 Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

description:

Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin with a flat backed finish and cream stand.

name: Limited Edition Muriel
description:
Made from a vintage textured barkcloth with pretty blues, greens and whites.  Muriel has a chrome thistle top and stand with a corset and laced back but you could choose a black metal stand.  I think she would look fabulous in a vintage inspired atelier, not to mention jolly useful !  Please note...the foot pedal/spring are purely decorative and not functional.
    
Only one mannequin will be made using this fabric so don't delay too long...once she has sold she's sold forever!

Please allow up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Laura Mannequin
description:
This beautiful mannequin is making a come back at Corset Laced Mannequins.  She was available a few year ago and now she's back!  The fabric is by Laura Ashley and is such a classic with its subtle, two tone floral scroll design.  Available in four colourways.

Shown here in Cranberry, size 10/12 with a corset laced back and black stand & top.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10
-The colourway - Cranberry, Duck Egg, Amethyst & Dove Grey

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Summer Mannequin
description:
What a fabulous colour, a bright, cheerful duck egg blue with beautiful shades of pinks, greens and yellows not to mention the stunning bird, butterflies and fauna!  Due to the nature of this fabric, pattern placement may vary.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Daisy Mannequin
description:
Stunning full sized mannequin tailored in Peony & Sage fabric by Kimberley Bell. A beautiful linen with the palest of blue/grey backgrounds and clusters of pretty roses. Do take a peek at the new Peony & Sage website as they have some stunning fabrics which I hope to be using more of very soon.

Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin with a flat backed finish. YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. -The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed -The size - 10/12 or 8/10 Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: The Paradise Mannequin
description:
These gorgeous wasp waisted mannequins were commissioned by the BBC for the latest BBC1 period drama, The Paradise.  Sumptuous damask fabric in a green & gold colourway.   The stand will be the same as the modern shaped mannequins, a different shape to these.   Other colourways for this mannequin called Celia are also available.

Wasp waisted mannequins are one size only. Fabrics from the more modern shaped mannequins can also be used to tailor a wasp waisted mannequin - please contact me if you have a request.

YOUR CHOICES - The finish at the back

- corset laced or flat backed

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Unique Vintage Stockman Mannequin c1930
description: Gertie, my beautiful Stockman mannequin, came to me with a damaged cover but rather than completely recover her (and lose the wonderful detail & Stockman logo) I decided to embellish her with a number of antique, cotton doilies which have been hand sewn on. They match the colour of her cloth perfectly and cover up some of the damage, whilst adding some wonderful texture to her. The papier mache body is completely sound and intact. The stand is a beautiful warm hazel colour which has had some dreaded woodworm damage but these have been treated to be on the safe side. I believe she dates from around the the 1930s. She measures app 39" bust, 30" waist & 43" hips She is listed for sale on Ebay with a starting bid of just Â£4.99! To bid, please go to the listing here...GERTIE MANNEQUIN If you need any more information or photographs, please do not hesitate to ask.

name: Emma Wasp Waisted Mannequin
description:
A delightfully simple linen from Laura Ashley has been used to tailor this wasp waisted mannequin. I've used a contrasting organza ribbon to add interest.

Wasp waisted mannequins are one size only.  Fabrics from the more modern shaped mannequins can also be used to tailor a wasp waisted mannequin - please contact me if you have a request.

YOUR CHOICES - The finish at the back

- corset laced or flat backed

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

Your mannequin will come with the new style stand & top as shown in the last photo. Choose from beech, painted black, cream or white.

name: Juliet Mannequin
description:
A fabulously simple yet elegant mannequin, tailored in a beautiful two toned linen. Shown here with a corset and laced back and white stand.
 
YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin is made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: RARE Edwardian Tabletop Display Mannequin
description: This fabulously rare tabletop mannequin dates, judging from the shape and the newspapers used to make her from the early 1900s. The base & top are not the originals but they do work very well together. The body is papier mache and you can see the newspapers of the day that were used to make the body which is still strong & sound with a "scuffed" area around the neck. The cover has a hole in the back and there are many water marks and stains, especially on the back but, like I say, the body is in good condition. She is listed for sale on Ebay with a starting bid of just Â£4.99! To bid, please go to the listing here...TABLETOP MANNEQUIN If you need any more information or photographs, please do not hesitate to ask.

name: Kate in Sage Mannequin
description:
Kate Forman's gently faded Roses fabric in sage creates this beautiful mannequin full of English country house charm.  Subtle tones of cream & sage green.  Shown here with a beech stand and top.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed

description:
Superb Laura Ashley fabric with its curlicue florals inspired by 18th century French toiles is perfect for a mannequin. Beautiful dove grey and snow white linen. 
Due to the nature of this fabric, pattern placement may vary.

Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin with a corset and laced back finish on a white stand.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

name: Parisienne Mannequin
description:
Paris here I come! This fabulous mannequin is tailored in a vintage inspired Paris map. The colours are a subtle taupe and charcoal with a hint of ivory. Spot the Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe, Notre Dam Catherdral and the River Seine to name a few.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Antique Stockman Wasp Waisted Decoupaged Mannequin
description: This gorgeous antique c1890s Stockman mannequin is listed for sale on Ebay with a starting bid of just Â£4.99! To bid, please go to the listing here...WASP WAISTED MANNEQUIN She has been lovingly decoupaged my me, using vintage papers from old magazines from the 1920s & 1950s with the elaborate "Les Journal des Brodeuses" emblem creating a unique and beautiful piece. The stand, top and arm caps have been painted in an ivory and gentle distressed. There are quite a few woodworm holes but these have long gone and there is some damage to the stand but this does not effect the use and it is very sold. The turnkey features the famous Stockman/Paris name. She measures 36" bust, 23" waist & 43" hips If you need any more information or photographs, please do not hesitate to ask.

name: Mary Mannequin
description:
A stunning fabric designed by William Morris in the late 1800s and printed by Sanderson in the UK today.   It shows a scrolling pattern of willow leaves and marigolds...beautiful!  A wonderful Arts and Crafts fabric which works perfectly on the female form. 

Fabric placement may vary slightly to the images here.

Shown here in Indigo and a size 10/12 and a flat backed finish on beech stand.  Available in six colourways, Indigo, Brick Red, Golden Yellow, Olive Green, Taupe and China Blue.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10
-Colourway - Indigo, Brick Red, Golden Yellow, Olive Green, Taupe or China Blue

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Snip Mannequin
description:
I'm always on the look out for beautiful fabrics with a vintage feel and this one caught my eye.  Wonderful imagery here including advertisements, mannequins, sewing machines and, of course, vintage scissors.  All on an oatmeal background.  

I've used a wide black organza ribbon and to emphasize the corseting, I used Laura Ashley's natural Austen linen underneath.

Shown here in a size 8/10 on a black stand.   
Fabric placement may vary slightly from photos.

name: Riley Mannequin
description:
I've used a subtle yet striking chevron fabric here and I think it work beautifully with the female form.  Shown here in a size 8/10 mannequin on a cream stand and corset laced back finish. The second image best represents the fabric colours of pale blue and natural tones. Fabric placement may vary slightly from photos.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin is made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Ivory Mannequin
description:
Almost a shade of white but not quite!  I call these my seamless mannequins because they only have one seam running down each side.   The cover is fixed to the mannequin.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

These mannequins are made to order (unless you've found her in the "in stock" category...in which case she's available for immediate dispatch!) so please expect to wait up to 7 business days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Emma Retro Stand Mannequin
description:
This simple, elegant mannequin is probably my most popular. I must have literally made hundreds in my standard mannequin but now she is available in my retro metal stand mannequin.  She works beautifully as a display in her own right or, of course, to display garments, scarves and jewels.  Please note...the foot pedal/spring are purely decorative and not functional.

You can see her here in the middle of the three versions of Emma.

Tailored using Laura Ashley's 100% linen called Austen in Natural and here with a corset and laced back but you could choose to have a hand stitched side seam ie flat backed.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know on Paypal checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Flora Mannequin
description:
Flora is tailored in Laura Ashley's beautiful Stowe fabric which has long been discontinued so this lovely is the last of a kind.  A gorgeous slubby linen with a classic English country home feel.  Fabric placement may vary slightly to the images here.

Shown here in a size 8/10 and has a corset and laced back finish using an ivory satin ribbon.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin is made to order, please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Biscuit Mannequin
description:
A classic natural biscuit ~ Perfect for just about any interior

I call these my seamless mannequins because they only have one seam running down each side.  The cover is fixed to the mannequin.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

These mannequins are made to order (unless you've found her in the "in stock" category...in which case she's available for immediate dispatch!) so please expect to wait up to 7 business days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Butterfly Mannequin
description:
Gorgeous colourful butterflies and delicate foliage adorn this stunning white fabric.  I've used a dark purple organza ribbon here but you could choose something more subtle. Due to the nature of this fabric, pattern placement may vary.

Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin with a corset and laced back finish on a white stand.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin is made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Large Antique Grain Sack Flower Corsage OOAK
description:
This large and impressive corsage has been made using an antique French grain sack dating from 1925.  You can see the original stitches that were made many years ago to repair the sack.  These, for me, are what makes this corsage so special.  The corsage has been finished with vintage lace and a vintage amber/silver brooch.  

Measuring app 6" diameter.

Of course, I've shown the corsages on my mannequins but they have so some many more uses...its up to you and your imagination.

Each corsage will come boxed and tissue wrapped. 
UK P&P Â£5.00

name: Antique Inspired Ribbon Flower Corsage #101
description:
Beautiful antique inspired flower corsage handmade exquisitely with the prettiest shaded ribbons measuring app 6.5" x 6"

This corsage will come with a meter of satin ribbon for you to fasten around the waist of your mannequin or the corsage can be pinned directly into the mannequin.

Of course, I've shown the corsages on my mannequins but they have so some many more uses...its up to you and your imagination. 

Each corsage will come boxed and tissue wrapped.  
UK P&P Â£4.00

name: Mimi Mannequin
description:
A very sweet, romantic mannequin with French postcards and love letters and a scattering of pink and red roses....ahhh Je t'aime.

Shown here in a size 8/10 mannequin with a flat back finish.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order otherwise, please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Mona Lisa Mannequin
description:
A simply stunning mannequin tailored in a printed linen.  Definitely one that will be noticed.  She's a real beauty! 

Shown here with a corset and laced back and black stand. 

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin is made to order (unless you've found her in the "in stock" category...in which case she's available for immediate dispatch as shown here!) otherwise, please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Velvet Cover - Pink
description:
Perfect for sprucing up your old mannequin. Simply slip on this fabulous velvet cover and hey presto she's as good as new! These are the same covers I use on my mannequins but without the body and stand.

This premium stretchy cover will fit a standard mannequin size UK 10/12 with measurements approximately 36" bust, 24" waist & 36" hips.

These covers are made to order so please expect to wait up to 5-7 days for dispatch.

name: Tailored Child Mannequin - Celia
description:
Aren't they adorable!  Pictured here with Celia mummy, these two child mannequins have been tailored with a corset and laced back.  Shown here with a 6-8 and 10-12 year old mannequins.  
I can use any of the fabrics shown on my male or female tailored range or have a mannequin tailored in your own fabric. As you can see the 3-4 and 6-8 year old mannequins come with a shorter beech stand only.  The 10-12 can come with taller beech,  black or cream stand.

Child mannequins come in three sizes ~ 3-4, 6-8 & 10-12

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The fabric choice
-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed

These mannequins are made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Ballerina Child Mannequin
description:
Perfect for budding ballerinas!  Shown here on a 10-12 year old mannequin with corset & laced back.
Also available on 6-8 year and and 3-4 but on a shorter tripod beech stand.

The 10-12 can come with taller beech, black or cream stand.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-Mannequin age - 3-4, 6-8 or 10-12 
-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed

These mannequins are made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Child Mannequin
description:
What a little darling!  This 6-8 year old sized mannequin has the beautiful Crushed Velvet Champagne fabric from my seamless range. Available in any of the following fabrics...
Teal velvet
Pink velvet
Black velvet
Chocolate velvet
Plaster velvet
Aubergine velvet
Red velvet
Biscuit
Ivory
Black
Cappuccino

You can see the fabrics on my plain/velvet mannequins category.

Child mannequins come in four sizes ~ 0-6 month, 3-4 years, 6-8 years & 10-12 years.

The 0-6, 3-4 and 6-8 year old mannequins come with a shorter beech stand only. The 10-12 can come with taller beech, black or cream stand.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The fabric colour/finish
-The size

These mannequins are made to order so please expect to wait up to 7-14 business days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Amelia 3-4 Year Old Child Mannequin
description:
Beautiful Amelia!  This cute 3-4 year old mannequin is tailored in a very pretty pale blue fabric with polka dots and clusters of pink roses and green foliage.  Do remember that you can choose any of the adult fabrics for your child mannequin.

She measures chest 23â waist 21â hips 25â ~ height 35â to 42â

Only available in a beech stand but you can choose the back finish - either corset & laced or flat backed.

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Flora 0-6 Month Old Mannequin
description:
Isn't she lovely! This cute 0-6 month old mannequin is tailored in Peony & Sage's Roses in Charcoal fabric. Do remember that you can choose any of the adult fabrics for your child mannequin. 

She measures chest 18.5â waist 17â hips 20â ~ height 30â to 33â

Only available in a beech stand and flat back.

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Dotty 0-6 Month Old Mannequin
description:
Isn't she lovely! This cute 0-6 month old mannequin is tailored in Peony & Sage's Swedish Gray Dots fabric.  Do remember that you can choose any of the adult fabrics for your child mannequin.

She measures chest 18.5â waist 17â hips 20â ~ height 30â to 33â

Only available in a beech stand and flat back.

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Sophie Mannequin in Green
description:
A striking lime green and white damask pattern. Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin on a white stand. Fabric placement may vary slightly from photos.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Celia Mannequin
description:
I absolutely adored her but I ran out of the fabric a few years ago and so couldn't offer her for sale.  So you can imagine my delight when I found a new supplier with even more fabulous colourways...Cerise, Peacock, Chocolate, Duck Egg, Fennel and Oyster.  Shown here in Oyster and Peacock.

The fabric is a beautiful Italian Damask. These two Oyster mannequins are gracing the National Gallery, London!

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The fabric colourway - cerise, peacock, chocolate, duck egg, fennel and oyster
-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Union Jack Mannequin
description:
Amazing full sized 38" male mannequin tailored in a riotous union jack fabric. These three dapper gents are destined for Austin Reed on Regents Street, London. 

He was featured in Period Ideas magazine, April 2010 and was used by Austin Reed for their press day in the Saatchi Gallery, London! (see last picture).

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The fabric finish - crisp white or stained vintage
-The height - short or tall

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Sophie Mannequin in Red
description:
A striking red and white damask pattern. Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin on a white stand.   She has a corset and lace back finish using a red satin ribbon but now  I think a black organza ribbon may have been more striking! Fabric placement may vary slightly from photos.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin is made to order, so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Kate Mannequin
description:
Stunning full sized mannequin tailored in Kate Forman's Roses linen fabric. A beautiful gentle faded pattern, full of English country house charm.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Flora Wasp Waisted Mannequin
description:
I do love these amazing wasp waisted mannequins and these beauties are tailored with a stunning Laura Ashley fabric called Stowe. Beautiful slubby linen with a classic English country home feel.

Wasp waisted mannequins are one size only.  Fabrics from the more modern shaped mannequins can also be used to tailor a wasp waisted mannequin - please contact me if you have a request.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know on Paypal checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
- Fabric colourway - Burgandy/Biscuit or Pink (Natural is sold out)

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

Your mannequin will come with the new style stand & top as shown in the last photo. Choose from beech, painted black, cream or white.

name: Olivia Mannequin
description:
Olivia is meant to be noticed and adored!  She is tailored in a fabulous fabric by Designers Guild called Darly.  Swirling arabesque pattern forms the background for exquisite floral sprays in bright colours against dramatic grounds.  I've used a bright cerise organza ribbon here but you could choose something more subtle.  Due to the nature of this fabric, pattern placement may vary. 

Shown here in a size 10/12 mannequin with a corset and laced back finish.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know on Paypal checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed 
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin is made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Antique 1883 Fabric Wasp Waisted Mannequin
description:
I've teamed up with Jennifer at Starched & Crumpled to bring you a new mannequin tailored in a beautiful antique German cloth.  Dating from 1883, this fabric has a gentle faded printed monogram...divine!  
 
This mannequin is unique and there will never be another one made in this cloth.  The mannequin and stand are new.

Displayed here on a black stand but you could choose a plain beech, white or cream painted stand.

name: Black Velvet Mannequin
description:
I call these my seamless mannequins because they only have one seam running down each side. The cover is fixed to the mannequin.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

These mannequins are made to order (unless you've found her in the "in stock" category...in which case she's available for immediate dispatch!) so please expect to wait up to 7 business days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Giselle Mannequin
description:
I've been looking for a fabric with a vintage decoupaged feel and I think this one does it beautifully! Vintage French postcards and wording, with pretty floral and lace detail here and there. The colours are cream, black and white...a classic combination.  Fabric placement may vary from photos.

Tailored here with a flat back finish but you could choose to a corset and laced back finish. 

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

name: Celia Wasp Waisted
description:
I do love these amazing wasp waisted mannequins and I also love this gorgeous rich and sumptuous Italian damask fabric. A beautiful cerise shade with a corset and laced back using a complimenting organza ribbon...ohh la la!

The images of the mannequin show the fabric as more of a red but the cerise is better represented by the fabric swatch on the last image...sorry about that.

Wasp waisted mannequins are one size only.  Fabrics from the more modern shaped mannequins can also be used to tailor a wasp waisted mannequin - please contact me if you have a request.

YOUR CHOICES - 

-The finish at the back, either corset laced or flat backed
-The fabric colourway Cerise, Peacock, Chocolate, Eau de nil, Fennel or Oyster....please let me know on Paypal checkout.

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

Wasp waisted mannequins are one size only.

Your mannequin will come with the new style stand & top as shown in the last photo. Choose from beech, painted black, cream or white.

name: Milkshake Mannequin
description:
A new mannequin and a new fabric! A simple shade of pink milkshake with a retro metal stand and neck thistle in matt black but a chrome stand and top is also available.  Fabrics from the other plain & velvet's range also available on this mannequin.  Shown here on a size 8/10.  Please note...the foot pedal/spring are purely decorative and not functional.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10
-The fabric colour/finish 

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Gracie Mannequin
description:
I saw these pretty fabrics together and thought "haha, a new hotchpotch mannequin!". The hotchpotch mannequin is tailored using different but complimentary fabrics. Gracie has a corset and laced back using a blue ribbon but you could choose a more subtle ribbon or even a flat backed finish with no ribbon at all.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

The finish at the back -  corset laced or flat backed
The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Snap Mannequin
description:
This mannequin is tailored using a fabulous photographic print fabric. I love the images here, from the cute eggcup face, the line of Penguin books, Fry's chocolate label to the "Closed" and "Way Out" sign.....Its all very clever.  Fabric placement may vary.

name: Spiral Mannequin
description:
Wow...a very stylish design.  I love the way the fabric meets perfectly creating an almost seamless paint effect.  Due to the nature of this fabric, every mannequin will be unique!

I've tailored Spiral with a hand finished back creating a smooth finish. You could choose a corset and laced version...just let me know on checkout.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

description:
A new mannequin and a new fabric!  Beautiful Orla with chrome stand and neck thistle.  I love the combination of the chrome with the orange, black and white of the fabric. Quite a retro Scandinavian feel here.  Fabrics from the other ranges also available on this mannequin.  Please note...the foot pedal/spring are purely decorative and not functional.

description:

I call these my seamless mannequins because they only have one seam running down each side.  The cover is fixed to the mannequin.

name: Antique 1929 French Grain Sack Mannequin OOAK #5
description:
A stunning, one of a kind mannequin tailored using a antique French grain sack dating from 1929. I love the colours and textures of old grain sacks and this one has some lovely detail. There are a number of original darns/mends to the fabric which add to the overall vintage industrial feel and the stenciling is simply awesome!  

The sack has been washed and tailored to fit a NEW, size 10/12, mannequin. The back finish is a flat back, hand stitched seam and shown here on a black painted stand & top.

I will be making more of these fabulous mannequins using other sacks/bags but each one will be a unique one of a kind beauty.

name: Antique 1925 French Grain Sack Mannequin OOAK #4
description:
A stunning, one of a kind mannequin tailored using a antique French grain sack dating from 1925. I love the colours and textures of old grain sacks and this one has heaps of detail and charm. There are a number of original darns/mends to the fabric which add to the overall vintage industrial feel and the stenciling is simply awesome!  The corsage is available separately. 

The sack has been washed and tailored to fit a NEW, size 8/10, mannequin. The back finish is a flat back, hand stitched seam and shown here on a black painted stand & top.

I will be making more of these fabulous mannequins using other sacks/bags but each one will be a unique one of a kind beauty.

name: Vintage French Hessian Sack Mannequin OOAK #3
description:
A stunning, one of a kind mannequin tailored using a vintage/antique French hessian sack. I love the colours and textures of old grain sacks and this one has heaps of detail and charm. There are a number of original darns/mends to the fabric which add to the overall vintage industrial feel and the stenciling is simply awesome!

The hessian bag has been washed and tailored to fit a NEW, size 8/10, mannequin. The back finish is a flat back, hand stitched seam and shown here on a black painted stand & top.

I will be making more of these fabulous mannequins using other sacks/bags but each one will be a unique one of a kind beauty.

name: Antique French Grain sack Mannequin OOAK 1922 #2
description:
A stunning, one of a kind mannequin tailored using an antique French grain sack. I love the colours and textures of old grain sacks and this one has heaps of detail and charm. There are a number of original darns/mends to the fabric which add to the overall vintage industrial feel and the aubergine stenciling is simply awesome!

The hessian bag has been washed and tailored to fit a NEW, size 10/12, mannequin. The back finish is a flat back, hand stitched seam and shown here on a black painted stand & top.

I will be making more of these fabulous mannequins using other sacks/bags but each one will be a unique one of a kind beauty.

name: Limited Edition Florence Mannequin
description:
Dear Florence, isn't she delightful. Tailored using a textured vintage fabric.  The background is a lovely shade of clay with cameos of pretty florals.  

The mannequin pictured here is sold and I have enough fabric for one more Florence!  The striped mannequin shown with Florence is Betty.

-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.

name: Limited Edition Vintage Clara
description:
The one and only Clara!  Isn't she pretty.  She's been tailored using a wonderful textured vintage fabric.  The background is a lovely shade of cream with cameos of pretty florals and scrolls.  

She is a size 10/12 with a flat back and shown here on a beech stand.  The other limited edition mannequin shown here is beautiful Agnes.

Dispatch will be made within 3 business days.

description:

name: Tuileries Mannequin
description:
A fabulous mannequin tailored in Laura Ashley's discontinued Tulieries fabric.  Gorgeous plum on an oatmeal background.   
This is the last one of these stunning mannequins, unless I can find more fabric.

She is in stock in a size 8/10 mannequin with a flat back finish.

name: Limited Edition Vintage Agnes
description:
The one and only Agnes!  Beautiful!  She's been tailored using a wonderful textured vintage fabric.  The background is a lovely shade of chalk pink with bouquets of pretty florals.  

She is a size 10/12 with a flat back and shown here on a black stand.  The other limited edition shown here is Clara.

Dispatch will be made within 3 business days.

name: Your Own Bespoke Wasp Waisted Mannequin
description:
If you have fabric that you would like me to use to tailor a wasp waisted mannequin with, please order her here. 

Please contact me first to discuss the fabric type/suitability, however, generally speaking, for a small patterned, medium weight cotton/linen fabric I would need 1.25metres of 140cm wide fabric. 

Larger quantities are required for larger and or symmetrical patterns where matching up is required.  

Lightweight cottons are not suitable.

name: Your Own Bespoke Mannequin
description:
If you have fabric that you would like me to use to tailor a mannequin with, please order her here. 

Please contact me first to discuss the fabric type/suitability, however, generally speaking, for a small patterned, medium weight cotton/linen fabric I would need 1.25metres of 140cm wide fabric. 

Larger quantities are required for larger and or symmetrical patterns where matching up is required.  

Lightweight cottons are not suitable.

name: Your Logo Mannequin
description:
I've been asked several times for a more personalised mannequin. So where best to start than with my own logo. It's really lovely to have a mannequin tailored in fabric with my company name on it. Obviously completely useless to anyone else but I love it!
I think it works beautifully for my company and I'm sure it will look great for yours too.  The design can be larger, smaller, coloured, patterned etc etc...the options are endless. All I need from you is your logo or idea and I'll do the rest, providing you with a proof before you commit.  Of course my mannequin had to have a corset and laced back finish but you could choose to have a hand finished side seam.

YOUR CHOICES - please let me know at checkout which of the following you would prefer. 

-The finish at the back - corset laced or flat backed
-The size - 10/12 or 8/10

Your mannequin will be made to order so please expect to wait up to 28 days for delivery, longer if international.
